statements: SELECT * FROM telecom_security WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM telecom_security WHERE phone_number = '1234567890';
SELECT id, username, phone_number FROM telecom_security WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM telecom_security WHERE id > 2 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT id, email FROM telecom_security WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' AND email LIKE '%@domain.com%';
SELECT * FROM telecom_security ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT email, phone_number FROM telecom_security WHERE username = 'john.doe'
SELECT id, username FROM telecom_security WHERE email IS NOT NULL AND phone_number IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM telecom_security WHERE id BETWEEN 10 AND 20
SELECT username, email, phone_number FROM telecom_security WHERE phone_number LIKE '555%'
SELECT * FROM user_authentication;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_authentication ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, last_login FROM user_authentication WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM access_control WHERE granted_at > NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY;
SELECT user_id, access_level FROM access_control ORDER BY user_id ASC, granted_at DESC;
SELECT username, last_login FROM user_authentication WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT access_level, granted_at FROM access_control WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_authentication ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM user_authentication WHERE last_login >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, access_level FROM user_authentication JOIN access_control ON user_authentication.user_id = access_control.user_id;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT email FROM users WHERE id = 2;
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE email = 'test@example.com';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE password = 'password123';
SELECT id, email FROM users WHERE id > 3 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id > 100;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_name LIKE 'adm%';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT user_id, MAX(timestamp) AS last_attempt FROM login_attempts GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(*) AS login_attempts FROM users u JOIN login_attempts la ON u.user_id = la.user_id WHERE la.success = false GROUP BY u.username;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, username, phone_number FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE phone_number IS NULL AND username='admin';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username='john_doe' OR username='jane_smith' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email, phone_number FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email, phone_number FROM users WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles r ON u.user_id = r.user_id JOIN permissions p ON r.role_id = p.user_role_id;
SELECT u.username, a.access_time, a.success FROM users u JOIN access_logs a ON u.user_id = a.user_id WHERE a.success = true;
